main event: A series of UFO sightings were reported by military personnel at Fort Jackson, South Carolina on March 23, 1966.
interesting points: The first sighting at 0312Z appeared to correlate with the presence of two RF4C aircraft in the area, but the later sightings at 0330Z and 1130Z remain unexplained.
The objects were described as oval-shaped, approximately 3 meters in diameter, and changing in color from white to glowing yellow.
The objects were observed hovering and moving straight ahead and horizontally, sometimes appearing to follow a truck in the area.
The objects were sighted by several trainees and the sergeant of the guard, and the sightings were reported to Shaw Air Force Base by an intelligence officer.
During the morning hours of March 24, 1966, a local TV station in Charlotte, North Carolina reported receiving 15 calls about UFOs in the Charlotte and Greenville, South Carolina area.
sighted object: oval-shaped objects, approximately 3 meters in diameter, changing in color from white to glowing yellow
witnesses: military personnel, including trainees and the sergeant of the guard
photographs: no photographs included in the report
